Package com.msc.serverbrowser.util.fx

Class OneLineStringProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.beans.binding.StringExpression
      • javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyStringProperty
        • javafx.beans.property.StringProperty
          • javafx.beans.property.StringPropertyBase
            • javafx.beans.property.SimpleStringProperty
              • com.msc.serverbrowser.util.fx.OneLineStringProperty

  • public class OneLineStringProperty
extends javafx.beans.property.SimpleStringProperty
    Special StringProperty Class, that automatically removes all LineBreaks of the content and trims it. This Property doesn't support null values.
    Since:
    25.06.2017
    Author:
    Marcel
